name: UpdateIncidentType
description:
Update the type of a specific incident in Datadog.

Use this tool to modify an existing incident type in Datadog by specifying the incident type ID.

parameters.name: incident_type_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID representing the incident type to be updated in Datadog.

value_schema.description: The UUID of the incident type.

parameters.name: incident_type_payload
parameters.description: JSON payload containing the incident type data, including attributes like name, description, and timestamps for updates.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the incident type was created.

createdBy.description: A unique identifier that represents the user that created the incident type.

description.description: Text that describes the incident type.

is_default.description: When true, this incident type will be used as the default type when an incident type is not specified.

lastModifiedBy.description: A unique identifier that represents the user that last modified the incident type.

modifiedAt.description: Timestamp when the incident type was last modified.

name.description: The name of the incident type.

prefix.description: The string that will be prepended to the incident title across the Datadog app.

data.description: Incident type data for a patch request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: incident_type_id
parameters.description: The UUID of the incident type.

value_schema.description: The UUID of the incident type.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the incident type was created.

createdBy.description: A unique identifier that represents the user that created the incident type.

description.description: Text that describes the incident type.

is_default.description: When true, this incident type will be used as the default type when an incident type is not specified.

lastModifiedBy.description: A unique identifier that represents the user that last modified the incident type.

modifiedAt.description: Timestamp when the incident type was last modified.

name.description: The name of the incident type.

prefix.description: The string that will be prepended to the incident title across the Datadog app.

data.description: Incident type data for a patch request.
